main event: A round red and white object was observed in the skies over Long Beach and Glennavon, California on July 13, 1955.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a quarter at arm's length., The object appeared to drop, ascend, and then fly westward., The sighting lasted for seven minutes., The object was reported to be faster than a jet., There were multiple observations recorded on different dates.
sighted object: one round red and white object
